body:
Comment 6 by **hrydgard**: 
Fair enough - but MSVC doesn't implement most of the new C99 features, 
unfortunately. Here's a summary of the situation: 
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/146381/visual-studio-support-for-new-c-c-
standards  

It appears that they "prioritize C++0x over implementing C99", which is 
unfortunate (seems that they should be able to do both).
